column_description: System generated unique id for the issue.  This is not the number that appears in the URL.
The text of the main description of the issue.
Boolean indicating whether the issue is locked.
Timestamp of when the issue was closed, NULL for issues that are open.
Timestamp of when the issue was created.
Foreign key that references the milestone table representing the current milestone the issue is in.
The issue number within a repository.  Is unique by repository, but not across repositories.
Boolean for is the issue is a pull request (true) ot regular issue (false)
Foreign key that references the repository table.
Whether the issue is open or closed.
Timestamp of when the last update was made to the issue.
Foreign key that references the user table, representing the user that created the issue.
